articles.description: Only 149 people have been admitted to intensive care units in Australia since the outbreak began here on 14 March – but people aged over 60 made up 69% of
articles.content:
Only 149 people have been admitted to intensive care units in Australia since the outbreak began here on 14 March but people aged over 60 made up 69% of admissions, according to the first national snapshot of COVID-19 patients requiring ICU.
The data collect… [+969 chars]

articles.title: France's virus death toll edges over Spain - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: France's virus death toll edges over Spain
